entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this morning and this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
